column4: I'm stoked about steam. I will be wiping out my windows partition....

I shouldn't get your hopes up /too/ high - I doubt /everything/ will get ported along with it.  Awesome as that would be.  OTOH, Valve could contribute enough to WINE to integrate it for those things that weren't ported... that'd be kinda cool.
I know what you're saying, and you're probably correct... but I still looking forward to the bright future! cheers!
Oh, yeah, it's still great that it's coming.
